titles.title: 6 Bedrooms bed in House in Na Jomtien H009263

descriptions.description: On walking distance from the beach, you will find this immaculate waterfront pool-villa. It is, with no doubt, THE most exclusive property on the Jomtien Yacht Club III estate, and likely one of the most exclusive properties in the whole of Pattaya-Jomtien. The property is fully secured by magnet sensors plus an “all-round” CCTV surveillance camera system. What sets this dwelling apart is not only its superb quality & overall design: It features a private mooring facility for a USA manufactured 26.8 FT Chris Craft speedboat with a MerCruiser® 350 magnum engine (300hp). You may class a Chris Craft vessel as the “Bentley” under the boats. The boat name is: “Knot for Sail”. As if this is not enough: For the ease of access there is a hydraulic walkway designed and installed for comfortable passenger boarding. Now, what else is on offer?This dream home is nested on 1,312 square meters of manicured gardens.The main building accommodates a spacious living/dining area with an adjoining entertainment lounge.An open kitchen with quality appliances & fittings, including a premium wine fridge, dishwasher, microwave, oven, American fridge with ice cubes dispenser and all kitchen utensils you may need.Linked to this beautiful kitchen is a prep kitchen – fully equipped, yet mainly used as laundry area with SIEMENS washing machine and separate tumbler dryer. The prep kitchen is easily accessible from both the garage as well as via a separate service entrance. The master bedroom is also located on the ground floor with a walk-inn wardrobe (plus electronic safety box) and spacious bathroom, his & hers sink-counter; rain-shower and duo Jacuzzi, fully airconditioned and integrated JBL sound system. Door- and window fittings are in u-PVC, double glazed for maximum comfort. All air conditioners are Daikin ceiling cassettes. Master bedroom, living/dining lounge an entertainment/office room all have nice view and direct access to the garden/swimming pool area. The freestyle pool side with 8 pax Jacuzzi is fantastic! A true entertainment area with a garden dome and terrace – fully geared to host the most exclusive parties… A professional JBL sound system, light system (LED – moving heads – laser) and special effects (Bubble machines and smoke streamers) completely transform the garden/pool area into a super trendy pool party, if you wish. On the second floor of this dream home there are 3 bedrooms with ensuite bathrooms.Each bedroom is fully furnished and hardly ever used: All in new condition. The garage is sizeable and offers a lot of storage area. The garage leads into the maids’ quarters with bedroom and bathroom and direct access to the prep kitchen.A power-generator, water purifying system and additional washer are also accommodated in the garage.The garage fits 1 car. Additional parking on the premises for another 2 cars.A recent addition was made to the villa: A 70 square meters fully equipped and airconditioned training center/Gym on top of the mooring dock. A fantastic way to stay in shape without leaving your house! What you see is what you get!This stunning villa comes fully furnished inclusive of all artworks, original paintings, and exclusive décor items. Some 600+ square meters of useable area and a poolside like no one else has.The Chris Craft speedboat is inclusive as well as an almost brand-new Yamaha Jet-Ski. The location of this immaculate villa is conveniently located near the new motorway entrance/exit (Ocean Marine) of the extended M7 towards Bangkok and Rayong. It is on a short 10 minutes’ drive from Pattaya. Nested on walking distance to the beach near trendy spots like Alexa Beach Club (former Cafe Del Mar); Bacco Beach, The Glasshouse, Tahiti Beach Club, TuTu beach, View Mare, and the CAVE, whereas locals would probably pop-down to Drifters on the beach every now and then. Make an appointment for a personal guided tour of this premium property with Gecko Properties to find out more H009263.

Large plot of land for sale next to Ramayana Water Park in Na Jomtien. This 16+ rai plot of land is located next to Asia’s #1 water park. Ramayana Water Park receives over 400,000 visitors per year making this a unique opportunity for investment. It is an excellent location for a hotel/convention center or a shopping/dining/entertainment complex. It could also be developed as a luxury housing estate. Please feel free to contact us to discuss the zoning details of the plot. The area is experiencing a lot of growth and with the opening of the new motorway in the next few months and the planned development of the high speed train to Bangkok the appeal of the area will only rise. Infrastructure The site currently has 2 deep wells with a capacity of 30+ cubic meters of water per hour and there is an electric line in close proximity to the park making it easy to run power to the plot. It is accessible via 2 public roads and the owners of the water park will be happy to discuss a separate entrance to the water park if desired providing easy access to the park for hotel guests or residents. Nearby Some of the area’s biggest attractions are only minutes away from the site including: Khao Chi Chan, the biggest carved Buddha image in the world which receives over 5,000 visitors per day. Silverlake Vineyard, another of Pattaya’s popular attractions. It is a great place to spend an afternoon or enjoy one of the many events. If you’re a golfer you are only minutes away from the Chee Chan Golf Resort, one of the area’s newest and premium links-style course. The resort offers golfers the chance to play on one of the most beautiful modern courses in Asia. The location is also only a short drive to some of the best beaches in the area and there are many fine and casual restaurants providing both Thai and European cuisine and some of the freshest seafood you will find. Access to Sukhumvit Road and Highway 331 is a breeze making Bangkok or Rayong closer than ever and the increased development of Utapao Airport means access to the area by international visitors will only increase. Don’t miss this excellent investment opportunity. Enquire today with the team at Gecko Properties and ask to arrange a viewing of this Land for sale in Thai ownership GKP-L008686.
